title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' in a specific scenario (reproduced with steps in 1GEWMOZ), nothing happens and the existing editor, scripted resource editor example, remains active. It should open a new editor on the file because the editor type is different.
EB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' in the mentioned scenario (reproduced with steps outlined in 1GEWMOZ), a new editor window should open for the file, considering the different editor type.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file 'test.xml' within the project.
3. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
4. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' option.
5. Verify that a new editor window opens for 'test.xml' with the Default Text Editor.
